titles.title: I Love The Body, I Love The Body

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I love the body, I love the body,
I love the body of the Lord.
I love the body, I love the body,
I love the body of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's a holy body, It's a holy body,
The holy body of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It's a righteous body, It's a righteous body,
The righteous body of the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
It's a loving body, It's a loving body,
The loving body of the Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
It's a perfect body, It's a perfect body,
The perfect body of the Lord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/Yo amo al cuerpo/ (2)
Yo amo al Cuerpo del Se単or
/yo amo al Cuerpo/ (2)
Yo amo al Cuerpo del Se単or

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
/Es un Cuerpo Santo/ (2)
Es un Cuerpo Santo del Se単or
/es un Cuerpo Santo/ (2)
Es un Cuerpo Santo del Se単or.
